/* Culinary uses */  Since the Onion is a very slippery vegetable, its best to slice the onion using a serrated edge knife to avoid slippage when initially placing the knife on the onion to cut.  This allows the onion to be sliced very quickly without unsafe slippage of the knife onto the fingers.
